effect.sun_moon: Inflicts damage equal to the user’s remaining HP. User faints.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts damage equal to the user’s remaining HP. User faints.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts damage equal to the user’s remaining HP. User faints.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to its HP.
